name: Quick Practice
description: Adds a practice button to the ouside of level

auto-practice.name: Auto Practice
auto-practice.description: Automaticlly starts the  level in practice mode

layout.name: Layout
layout.description: Changes the size and position of the buttons

offsets.name: Offsets
offsets.description: Offsets for the buttons (NOTE: Offets only change the buttons in LevelInfoLayer NOT EditLevelLayer)

offset-x.name: Practice Button Offset X
offset-x.description: Horizontal offset for the practice button

offset-y.name: Practice Button Offset Y
offset-y.description: Vertical offset for the practice button

play-offset-x.name: Play Button Offset X
play-offset-x.description: Horizontal offset for the play button

play-offset-y.name: Play Button Offset Y
play-offset-y.description: Vertical offset for the play button

scale-offset.name: Practice Button Scale Offset
scale-offset.description: Scale offset for the practice button

play-scale-offset.name: Play Button Scale Offset
play-scale-offset.description: Scale offset for the play button
